tool_input.command:
if [ ! -z "$GITHUB_PAT" ]; then export GH_TOKEN="$GITHUB_PAT"; fi && gh pr create --title "feature: #8 - Add option to edit and delete task" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR implements the ability to edit and delete tasks in the week planner application, as requested in issue #8.

## Implementation Plan

See [specs/feature-8-edit-delete-task.md](specs/feature-8-edit-delete-task.md) for the full implementation plan.

## Changes Made

- Added edit icon (pencil) to each task card that opens the task creation modal in edit mode
- Added delete icon (trash can) to each task card with confirmation dialog before deletion
- Implemented `updateTask()` method in TaskService for updating existing tasks
- Enhanced the task modal to support both creation and editing modes
- Added confirmation dialog for task deletion with proper styling
- Updated task card layout to include action buttons while maintaining visual consistency

## Key Files Modified

- `app/client/src/app/app.component.ts` - Added edit/delete functionality and modal state management
- `app/client/src/app/app.component.html` - Added edit/delete buttons to task cards and confirmation dialog
- `app/client/src/app/app.component.css` - Styled action buttons and confirmation dialog
- `app/client/src/app/services/task.service.ts` - Added updateTask() method

Closes #8

ADW ID: 8adf7635
EOF
)" --base main
